name: Has anyone in the history of personal blogs ever wanted a “guest post” from a rando? Of course not. Why this is a common spam request I get baffles me.

content.html: Has anyone in the history of personal blogs ever wanted a “guest post” from a rando? Of course not. Why this is a common spam request I get baffles me.

summary: @cleverdevil that used to be a thing… +15yrs ago. Kind of a “get reputational value” before SEO was the juice of choice

summary: @cleverdevil I once let my brother guest-post on my personal blog and ended up arguing with him in the comments on the content and that was after editing his post for language and grammar. Never again.
